item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Tuesday, March 25, 2025 at 5:15 AM UTC
item.description:
1. German parliament votes as a Git contribution graph (148 points | 54 comments)
2. Qwen2.5-VL-32B: Smarter and Lighter (403 points | 199 comments)
3. Triforce – a beamformer for Apple Silicon laptops (476 points | 183 comments)
4. WWI's 'Dazzle' Camouflage Seemed Effective Due to Unexpected Optical Trick (36 points | 6 comments)
5. Show HN: I'm a teacher and built an AI presentation tool (108 points | 47 comments)
6. Three Hundred Years Later, a Tool from Isaac Newton Gets an Update (44 points | 9 comments)
7. Arc-AGI-2 and ARC Prize 2025 (137 points | 55 comments)
8. Search My Site – open-source search engine for personal and independent websites (11 points | 1 comment)
9. CO2 laser enables long-range detection of radioactive material (70 points | 15 comments)
10. MRubyD: A new mruby virtual machine implemented in pure C# (54 points | 13 comments)
11. Intel: A Bug and a Pro (41 points | 20 comments)
12. Can Parrot Brains Teach Us About Human Speech? (10 points | discuss)
13. It's Time to Stop Building KV Databases (47 points | 30 comments)
14. Project Operation Whitecoat (2010) (98 points | 74 comments)
15. The Prospero Challenge (75 points | 28 comments)
16. The earliest versions of the first C compiler known to exist (325 points | 138 comments)
17. Mastering Delphi 5 2025 Annotated Edition Is Now Complete (163 points | 85 comments)
18. 600M years of shared environmental stress response found in algae and plants (75 points | 5 comments)
19. Peano's Axioms (72 points | 26 comments)
20. I won't connect my dishwasher to your cloud (432 points | 297 comments)
21. Aircraft detection at planetary scale (50 points | 52 comments)
22. Post Apocalyptic Computing (6 points | 1 comment)
23. Autology: A Lisp with access to its own interpreter (112 points | 44 comments)
24. Chatbots could spark the next big mental health crisis (52 points | 44 comments)
25. Rickover's Lessons (101 points | 89 comments)
26. Gatehouse – a composable, async-friendly authorization policy framework in Rust (52 points | 26 comments)
27. Show HN: LinkedIn sucks, so I built a better one (389 points | 318 comments)
28. The Wright brothers invented the airplane, right? Not if you're in Brazil (216 points | 466 comments)
29. Researchers search for more precise ways to measure pain (82 points | 70 comments)
30. Project Aardvark: reimagining AI weather prediction (291 points | 128 comments)
